dataset.title: Keywords and Terms from the LTER Network - 2006

address.deliveryPoint: UVA, Department of Environmental Sciences, 291 McCormick Road, P.O. Box 400123

metadataProvider.organizationName: Virginia Coast Reserve Long-Term Ecological Research Project

address.deliveryPoint: Department of Environmental Sciences, University of Virginia, 291 McCormick Road, PO Box 400123

abstract.para: This dataset contains a list of keywords and keyterms used in U.S. LTER documents and datasets. It was jointly created by the Information Management Committee of the U.S. LTER.

section.title: Data License
section.para: Data and documentation is copyrighted by The Virginia Coast Reserve LTER project of the University of Virginia (UVA), and ownership remains with the UVA.
The UVA grants you (hereafter, Licensee) a license to use the data and documentation for academic, and research purposes only, without a fee.
Licensee may make derivative works. However, if Licensee distributes any derivative work based on or derived from the data and documentation, then Licensee will

listitem.para: notify the VCR/LTER designated contact (typically the investigator who collected the data) regarding its distribution of the derivative work, and
clearly notify users that such derivative work is a modified version and not the original data and documentation distributed by the UVA.
acknowledge the support of NSF Grants BSR-8702333-06, DEB-9211772, DEB-9411974, DEB-0080381 and DEB-0621014 in any publications using the data and documentation.
send to the address, above, two reprints of any publications resulting from use of the data and documentation.

section.para: Any Licensee wishing to make commercial use of the data and documentation should contact the UVA, c/o VCR/LTER, to negotiate an appropriate license for such commercial use. Commercial use includes

listitem.para: integration of all or part of the data and documentation into a product for sale or license by or on behalf of Licensee to third parties, or
distribution of the data or documentation to third parties that need it to utilize a commercial product sold or licensed by or on behalf of Licensee.

para.emphasis: UVA MAKES NO REPRESENTATIONS ABOUT THE SUITABILITY OF THIS DATA AND DOCUMENTATION FOR ANY PURPOSE. IT IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTY. THE UVA SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY DAMAGES SUFFERED BY THE USERS OF THIS DATA AND DOCUMENTATION.

section.para: By using or copying this data and documentation, Licensee agrees to abide by the copyright law and all other applicable laws of the U.S. including, but not limited to, export control laws, and the terms of this license. UVA shall have the right to terminate this license immediately by written notice upon Licensee's breach of, or non-compliance with, any of its terms. Licensee may be held legally responsible for any copyright infringement that is caused or encouraged by Licensee's failure to abide by the terms of this license.

contact.positionName: Information manager - Virginia Coast Reserve Long-Term Ecological Research Project

address.deliveryPoint: Department of Environmental Sciences, University of Virginia, 291 McCormick Road, PO Box 400123

publisher.organizationName: Virginia Coast Reserve Long-Term Ecological Research Project

address.deliveryPoint: Department of Environmental Sciences, University of Virginia, 291 McCormick Road, PO Box 400123

description.para: Lists of words and terms, along with the identity of the source documents, number of sites where a word was used and total number of uses were tallied. The lists were combined and tallied using the SPSS program listed below:

para.literalLayout:
GET DATA /TYPE = TXT /FILE = 'D:\Work\vocab\consolidate\dtoc.csv' /DELCASE = LINE /DELIMITERS = "," /ARRANGEMENT = DELIMITED /FIRSTCASE = 1 /IMPORTCASE = ALL /VARIABLES = src A20 term A30 DTOC_Nsites F8.0 DTOC_Nuses F8.0
. CACHE. EXECUTE. COMPUTE term = upcase(term) . SORT CASES BY term (A) . EXECUTE . Save Outfile='D:\Work\vocab\consolidate\dtoc.sav'.
GET DATA /TYPE = TXT /FILE = 'D:\Work\vocab\consolidate\emlAttributes.csv' /DELCASE = LINE /DELIMITERS = "," /QUALIFIER = '"' /ARRANGEMENT = DELIMITED /FIRSTCASE = 1 /IMPORTCASE = ALL /VARIABLES = src A20 term A30 EMLA_Nsites F8.0 EMLA_Nuses F8.0
. CACHE. EXECUTE. COMPUTE term = upcase(term) . SORT CASES BY term (A) . EXECUTE . Save Outfile='D:\Work\vocab\consolidate\emlA.sav'.
GET DATA /TYPE = TXT /FILE = 'D:\Work\vocab\consolidate\emlKeywords.csv' /DELCASE = LINE /DELIMITERS = "," /QUALIFIER = '"' /ARRANGEMENT = DELIMITED /FIRSTCASE = 1 /IMPORTCASE = ALL /VARIABLES = src A20 term A30 EMLK_Nsites F8.0 EMLK_Nuses F8.0
. CACHE. EXECUTE. COMPUTE term = upcase(term) . SORT CASES BY term (A) . EXECUTE . Save Outfile='D:\Work\vocab\consolidate\emlK.sav'.
GET DATA /TYPE = TXT /FILE = 'D:\Work\vocab\consolidate\emlTitles.csv' /DELCASE = LINE /DELIMITERS = "," /QUALIFIER = '"' /ARRANGEMENT = DELIMITED /FIRSTCASE = 1 /IMPORTCASE = ALL /VARIABLES = src A20 term A30 EMLT_Nsites F8.0 EMLT_Nuses F8.0
. CACHE. EXECUTE. COMPUTE term = upcase(term) . SORT CASES BY term (A) . EXECUTE . Save Outfile='D:\Work\vocab\consolidate\emlT.sav'.
GET DATA /TYPE = TXT /FILE = 'D:\Work\vocab\consolidate\publications.csv' /DELCASE = LINE /DELIMITERS = "," /QUALIFIER = '"' /ARRANGEMENT = DELIMITED /FIRSTCASE = 1 /IMPORTCASE = ALL /VARIABLES = src A20 term A30 PUB_Nsites F8.0 PUB_Nuses F8.0
. CACHE. EXECUTE. COMPUTE term = upcase(term) . SORT CASES BY term (A) . EXECUTE . Save Outfile='D:\Work\vocab\consolidate\PUB.sav'.
MATCH FILES /FILE='D:\Work\vocab\consolidate\dtoc.sav' /FILE='D:\Work\vocab\consolidate\EMLA.sav' /RENAME (src = d0) /BY term /DROP= d0. EXECUTE. MATCH FILES /FILE=* /FILE='D:\Work\vocab\consolidate\EMLK.sav' /RENAME (src = d0) /BY term /DROP= d0. EXECUTE. MATCH FILES /FILE=* /FILE='D:\Work\vocab\consolidate\EMLT.sav' /RENAME (src = d0) /BY term /DROP= d0. EXECUTE. MATCH FILES /FILE=* /FILE='D:\Work\vocab\consolidate\PUB.sav' /RENAME (src = d0) /BY term /DROP= d0. EXECUTE.
COMPUTE NLISTS = NVALID(DTOC_Nuses,EMLA_Nuses,EMLK_Nuses,EMLT_Nuses,PUB_Nus\ es) . EXECUTE . IF (MISSING(DTOC_Nsites)) DTOC_Nsites=0. IF (MISSING(DTOC_Nuses)) DTOC_Nuses=0. IF (MISSING(EMLA_Nsites)) EMLA_Nsites=0. IF (MISSING(EMLA_Nuses)) EMLA_Nuses=0. IF (MISSING(EMLK_Nsites)) EMLK_Nsites=0. IF (MISSING(EMLK_Nuses)) EMLK_Nuses=0. IF (MISSING(EMLT_Nsites)) EMLT_Nsites=0. IF (MISSING(EMLT_Nuses)) EMLT_Nuses=0. IF (MISSING(PUB_Nsites)) PUB_Nsites=0. IF (MISSING(PUB_Nuses)) PUB_Nuses=0. EXECUTE. COMPUTE maxSites=MAX(DTOC_Nsites,EMLA_Nsites,EMLK_Nsites,EMLT_Nsites,PUB_Ns\ ites).
COMPUTE minSites=MIN(DTOC_Nsites,EMLA_Nsites,EMLK_Nsites,EMLT_Nsites,PUB_Ns\ ites).
COMPUTE maxUses=MAX(DTOC_Nuses,EMLA_Nuses,EMLK_Nuses,EMLT_Nuses,PUB_Nuses).
COMPUTE minUses=MIN(DTOC_Nuses,EMLA_Nuses,EMLK_Nuses,EMLT_Nuses,PUB_Nuses).\
Sort cases by NLISTS (D), minSites (D), maxSites (D), minUses (D), maxUses\ (D).
Compute isTerm=0. If (index(rtrim(term)," ") GT 0) isTerm=1. PRINT FORMATS NLISTS to isTerm (F8.0). SAVE OUTFILE='D:\Work\vocab\consolidate\all5.sav' /DROP=src /COMPRESSED.
GET FILE='D:\Work\vocab\consolidate\all5.sav'.
SAVE TRANSLATE OUTFILE='D:\Work\vocab\consolidate\lterWords5.dat' /TYPE=TAB /MAP /REPLACE /FIELDNAMES.
SAVE TRANSLATE OUTFILE='D:\Work\vocab\consolidate\lterWords5.xls' /TYPE=XLS /VERSION=8 /MAP /REPLACE /FIELDNAMES /CELLS=VALUES .

ISTERM - Is it a multi-word term?

codeDefinition.definition: Yes, it is a multi-word term
